ingredients: 1 1/2 cups frozen tri-color peppers and onion mix
instructions: Lightly coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray, then heat skillet to medium-low.
Add peanut butter, soy sauce, and garlic to skillet, stirring frequently until the peanut butter softens.
Microwave the pepper mix according to package instructions, then stir into the peanut mixture.
Toss the peanut chicken mixture with boiled, drained noodles.
title: Fit-To-Be-Thai'd Peanut Chicken

normalized_ingredients.IDgZofHKz: frozen tri-color peppers and onion mix

steps: Lightly coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray, then heat skillet to medium-low. Add peanut butter, soy sauce, and garlic to skillet, stirring frequently until the peanut butter softens. Microwave the pepper mix according to package instructions, then stir into the peanut mixture. Add the chicken. Toss the peanut chicken mixture with boiled, drained noodles.
